mapper.select: SELECT answer_no answerNo, member_name memberName, answer_content answerContent, answer_createdate answerCreateDate, answer_updatedate answerUpdateDate, answer_ip answerIp FROM dev_answer WHERE question_no = #{questionNo} ORDER BY answer_no DESC LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{rowPerPage}
